title: 82/313/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 May 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'SPEX - scanning Czerny-Turner spectrometer, model 1269', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 May 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'SPEX - scanning Czerny-Turner spectrometer, model 1269' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/313/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'SPEX - scanning Czerny-Turner spectrometer, model 1269', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 23 October 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 May 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
